NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said.`` He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations.'' Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.
